description: This file is a PHP source code that generates a web page for configuring IPv4 and IPv6 settings, including DHCP lease times, IP addresses, subnet masks, and IPv6 prefix configurations. It includes embedded JavaScript for form validation and dynamic interaction, as well as PHP code for server-side data fetching and rendering.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Fetches configuration parameters from device configuration using provided keys.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a string value from device configuration given a path.

methods.name: getInstanceIds
methods.description: Returns an array of instance IDs for a specified device configuration path.

methods.name: isValidIp6Str
methods.description: Validates whether a string is a valid IPv6 address.
